article.title: Cleopatra’s Needle
article.p:
Cleopatra’s Needle
Cleopatra’s Needle in Alexandria, Egypt,
c.
1880. It was later moved to Central Park in New York City.
Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.; (Digital File Number: cph 3a49369)
Cleopatra’s Needle
,
either of two monumental Egyptian obelisks.
See
obelisk
.
